3. From rule 13, the owner of the snake is the person drinking hot-chocolate. So, we know the position of the Russian (R).

4. From rule 11, the owner of the bird is between the person watching thriller movies and the Russian (R). Since the person watching thriller movies is on the far right (rule 8), the bird cannot be in position 3. So, the bird must be in position 1 or 2.

6. From rule 5, the person eating plum is between the person drinking soy-milk and the person eating nectarine. Since the Russian (R) drinks hot-chocolate and is in position 3, the person drinking soy-milk cannot be in position 3. So, the person drinking soy-milk must be in position 1 or 2.

7. From rule 9, the person eating nectarine is between the Japanese (J) and the fan of country. Since the Russian (R) is in position 3, the Japanese (J) cannot be in position 3. So, the Japanese (J) must be in position 1 or 2.

8. Since the person eating nectarine is a fan of ambient (rule 1), the person eating nectarine cannot be in position 3 (since the Russian (R) is in position 3 and we already know the position of the person eating nectarine). So, the person eating nectarine must be in position 1 or 2.

9. From rule 1, the fan of ambient is the person eating nectarine. So, we know the position of the person eating nectarine.

10. From rule 10, the person watching superhero movies is the manager. Since the Russian (R) is in position 3, the manager cannot be in position 3. So, the manager must be in position 1 or 2.

11. From rule 7, the person eating plum is on the left or right of the Mexican (M). Since the Russian (R) is in position 3, the Mexican (M) cannot be in position 3. So, the Mexican (M) must be in position 1 or 2.

12. Since the person watching thriller movies is on the far right (rule 8), the only position left for the person watching thriller movies is position 3.

13. From rule 10, the person watching superhero movies is the manager. Since the person watching thriller movies is on the left or right of the Mexican (M) (rule 11), the manager (superhero watcher) must be on the other side of the Mexican (M). So, the manager (superhero watcher) must be in position 1.

14. From rule 2, the manager is on the left or right of the Russian (R). Since the manager is in position 1, the Russian (R) must be in position 2 or 3. But we already know the position of the Russian (R) from rule 3. So, this rule is contradictory and cannot be true.

Unfortunately, there seems to be a contradiction in the given rules, and it's not possible to solve the puzzle as it stands.
